metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15469 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In QEMU 4.2.0, a MemoryRegionOps object may lack read/write callback methods, leading to a NULL pointer dereference.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> impact is limited, a privileged guest user can only use this issue to perform a denial of service to their own instance

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
